Package affix.java.project.moneyservice

Class Site

  • java.lang.Object
    • affix.java.project.moneyservice.Site
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MoneyService
    public class Site
extends java.lang.Object
implements MoneyService
    This class holds information about available currencies and amount for a specific Site. The class handles orders from customers and converts them into a transaction if the order is approved.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double> cash
      cash a Map<String, Double> with a String holding the code of the currency (three capital letters) and amount of each currency

      currencies a Map<String, Currency> with a String holding the code of the currency (three capital letters) and corresponding Currency object
      private static java.util.logging.Logger logger
      logger a Logger
      private java.lang.String name
      name a String holding the name of the Money Service site
      private java.util.List<Transaction> transactions
      transactions a List<Transaction> holding each transaction made for the day

      • Site

        public Site​(java.lang.String name,
            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double> cash,
            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Currency> currencies)
        Default constructor for creating a complete Site object.
        Parameters:
        name - a String holding name of the Money Service site
        cash - a Map<String, Double> with a String holding the code of the currency (three capital letters) and amount of each currency
        currencies - a Map<String, Currency> with a String holding the code of the currency (three capital letters) and corresponding Currency object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if parameters does not match requirements
